name: netgoat
tagline: A deliberately vulnerable app for learning web security
description: NetGoat is an intentionally vulnerable application designed for learning and testing web app security issues. It runs with a simple web UI and offers challenges and exercises for security training.

features.title: Vulnerability Challenges
features.description: Practice exploiting common web security flaws in a safe environment

features.title: Owasp Coverage
features.description: Learn about vulnerabilities from the OWASP Top 10 including injection and XSS

features.title: Single Sign-On
features.description: Step-by-step lessons explain vulnerabilities and how to identify them

features.title: Hands
features.description: Test security tools and techniques against realistic vulnerable applications

features.title: Safe Testing Environment
features.description: Isolated sandbox prevents accidental damage to production systems

features.title: Multiple Difficulty Levels
features.description: Progress from beginner to advanced security concepts at your own pace

features.title: Detailed Explanations
features.description: Understand why vulnerabilities exist and how to prevent them in real applications

features.title: Security Tool Integration
features.description: Practice using scanners, proxies, and other security testing tools
